statements: UPDATE InfectiousDiseases SET disease_name = 'Malaria', start_date = '2022-04-15' WHERE id = 1;
UPDATE InfectiousDiseases SET location = ST_GeographyFromText('POINT(40.7128 -74.0060)'), end_date = '2022-05-30', disease_name = 'COVID-19' WHERE start_date = '2022-04-01';
UPDATE InfectiousDiseases SET start_date = '2022-05-20', end_date = '2022-06-30' WHERE id = 1;
UPDATE InfectiousDiseases SET location = ST_GeomFromText('POINT(-122.234875 47.867388)', 4326), disease_name = 'COVID-19' WHERE id = 2;
UPDATE patients SET age = 25, gender = 'Male' WHERE patient_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
UPDATE patients SET gender = 'Female', age = 30 WHERE patient_id = '98765432-1a2b-3c4d-9e8f-1g2h3i4j5k6l';
UPDATE patients SET location = ST_GeogFromText('POINT(-122.3491 47.6204)'), age = 30 WHERE patient_id = '3521f276-44a7-4e52-8eaf-f548163f23d8';
UPDATE patients SET gender = 'Female', age = 25, location = ST_SetSRID(ST_MakePoint(-122.3321, 47.6062), 4326) WHERE gender = 'Male';
UPDATE InfectiousDiseaseCases SET city = 'New York', date = '2022-09-15' WHERE id = 1;
UPDATE DiseaseSpreadAnalysis SET simulation_result = 'Successful Simulation', spread_probability = 0.75 WHERE analysis_id = 5;
UPDATE InfectiousDiseaseCases SET city='New York', latitude=40.7128, longitude=-74.0060 WHERE id=1001;
UPDATE DiseaseControlMeasures SET measure_description='Implemented social distancing measures in public places.', implementation_date='2022-03-15', measure_effectiveness=0.85 WHERE measure_id=2002;
UPDATE location_data SET latitude = 40.7128, longitude = -74.0060 WHERE location_id = 1;
UPDATE spread_analysis SET most_affected_location = 'New York' WHERE analysis_id = 1;
UPDATE location_data SET location_name = 'New York City', longitude = -74.0060 WHERE location_id = 1;
UPDATE patient_data SET age = 30, gender = 'Male' WHERE patient_id = 3;
UPDATE Locations SET latitude = 37.7749, longitude = -122.4194 WHERE location_id = 1;
UPDATE Diseases SET description = 'This disease causes fever and cough.' WHERE disease_id = 2;
UPDATE Diseases SET description = 'New description' WHERE disease_id = 1;
UPDATE Patients SET age = 35, gender = 'Male' WHERE patient_id = 3;
